title: The Rise of Silas Lapham - complex experience

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Howells uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complex experience of the two sisters within their family and society.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Howells uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complex experience of the two sisters within their family and society.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
